amendment.description: To reduce the eligibility age for receipt of non-regular military service retired pay for members of the Ready Reserve in active federal status or on active duty for significant periods.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2433 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 314.

action.text: Amendment SA 2433 proposed by Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S12423-12426; text: CR S12423) To reduce the eligibility age for receipt of non-regular military service retired pay for members of the Ready Reserve in active federal status or on active duty for significant periods.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 2433 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 314.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2433 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 99 - 0. Record Vote Number: 314.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2433 proposed by Senator Chambliss.
